briefTitle: Utilization of the OncoCEE™ Platform to Evaluate Selected Biomarker Alterations in CTCs Isolated From Patients With MBC
officialTitle: Utilization of the OncoCEE™ Platform to Evaluate Selected Biomarker Alterations in CTCs Isolated From Patients With MBC
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Current patient at participating clinic
* Metastatic breast cancer diagnosis
* 18 years of age or older

Exclusion Criteria:

None
